Fall 2025

calendar-tool.title: Calendar Tool
calendar-tool.image_alt: An image of a blue gradient.
calendar-tool.description: I designed this project the summer before my first semester at Northeastern so I could easily and repeatedly import the events from my schedule into my Outlook

puzzle-game.title: Puzzle Game
puzzle-game.image_alt: An image showing content related to puzzle-game
puzzle-game.description: I created a puzzle game, named Terra Bomber, using the Godot game engine. Terra Bomber hinges on the idea of destructible puzzles, where levels consist of bombs

youtube-comment-analyzer.title: Youtube Comment Analyzer
youtube-comment-analyzer.image_alt: An image of a blue gradient.
youtube-comment-analyzer.description: This project was a personal project that I did for fun during high school with the goal of gaining empirical experience with professional-grade tools and cloud
